description:
This additional content includes:

- Hunter Voice: Tadori

The voice of Doctor Tadori, who travels the world for his research. What if he were to go out hunting to collect materials for his concoctions!? "There's no malady that I can't remedy!"

Change up your hunterâ€™s sound with this special voice option!

- Voices can be applied by selecting Change Appearance in the Item Box. They can also be used while creating a character.
- This item changes the voice of the character without affecting their stats and abilities.
name: Hunter Voice: Tadori
